Description:
Decent Size Family home for sale! Highlands
Four Bedroom Delight!
This fantastic four bedroom home is ideal for a family!
Kitchen is fitted with stone bench top, stainless steel appliances including dishwasher, gas stove top and oven, with an abundance of cupboard space.
First floor consist of Separate lounge area, powder room, laundry room and spacious dining area overlooking back yard.
Second floor consist of 4 spacious bedrooms, Master bedroom fitted with ensuite and WIR, Bright central bathroom with washroom and bath and separate living area.
Additional features include ducted heating and cooling throughout, double garage with remote control and 2 Separate living area.
Located within proximity to bus, trains, local shops, highland shopping center and Hume Anglican grammar school
Secure your inspection today - you will be impressed!
Insights: 128 Grevillea Street, Craigieburn VIC 3064 was last sold in 2019 and 351 other 4 bedroom house in Craigieburn have recently been sold.

AN OPPORTUNITY NOT TO BE MISSED
Conveniently located close to Stockland Highlands Shopping Centre, parks and schools, this well presented single level family home features 3 good size bedrooms with BIR's, master with full ensuite and WIR, open living including lounge, large kitchen and meals area, second bathroom including laundry, single brick garage with internal access and good size rear yard.
Joseph Sassine 0419 332 839 or Romeo Sassine 0411 882 605

Description:
Brand New & $10,000 FHOG for eligible buyers!!
This Brand New Residence situated in the highly sought-after Highlands Estate will be sure to impress all. This modern and proudly built home is great for first home buyers, down-sizers and investors. Comprising of 3 great size bedrooms including master bedroom with ensuite and walk in robe, generously sized kitchen with stone benchtops & stainless steel appliances, open plan meals and family area, and much more. With other features on hand including ducted heating, evaporative cooling, single lock up garage with remote control and internal access. Within close proximity Hume Anglican grammar and other local amenities including Highlands Shopping Centre, Highlands Hotel, parklands, public transport, Splash Aquatic Aqua Park and Leisure centre this home is very centrally located. Inspections will not disappoint!

Description:
Instantly Appealing in a Prized Location
Be quick to inspect this beautifully presented home offering gorgeous street appeal and quality interior features with an abundance of natural light & character to all home buyers and investors alike. Offering 3 bedrooms, fully equipped kitchen with stainless steel appliances & dishwasher, main bathroom, large open plan meals area with adjoining family room. Step outside and you will find an entertainer's delight, complete with under cover alfresco & surrounded by low maintenance landscaped gardens. A host of extras include high ceilings, ducted heating & evaporative cooling, beautifully maintained carefree gardens, alarm system, single garage plus more. All this offering a blend of low maintenance living, without compromising space or comfort. Ideally located in one of Craigieburn's most popular estates & tightly held streets amongst quality homes & parkland. With all the amenities close by including local schools & shops, shopping centers, public transport & child care facilities, be quick to inspect as this one won't hang around for long!

Description:
Clean, Comfortable: A Family Classic
Walk just a few short minutes to Craigieburn Central Shopping Centre and Willmott Park Primary from this relaxing home where the quietness of cul-de-sac surrounds complement its amiable family character and lifestyle. Brilliantly spacious living, alfresco entertaining and versatile retreat.
- Land size approximately 694m2
- The modern charm addresses all aspects of family comfort
- Fitted robes for all three bedrooms (walk-in in main)
- Elegant contemporary bathroom with rain shower
- Wraparound kitchen constitutes the heart of the home
- Exceptionally spacious dining and living area
- Fabulous covered alfresco area perfect for entertaining
- Secure, Lock up Garage
- Ducted fans circulate the warmth of the Coonara
- Evaporative cooling
- The position keeps parks and the station close by

Description:
Sizable Living, Desirable Location
Be amazed by this wonderful family home which welcomes you with its touch of style, character & class & is ideal for the astute purchaser who loves to entertain the masses.
Nestled in an elite location on a whisper quiet tree-lined setting, within walking distance to the beautiful Hyde Park, Mt Ridley College, shops, bus stop & spread out on a fantastic allotment of approx 512m2, this sensational home will no doubt be the envy of all family & friends forever!
From its manicured allotment through to its cleverly zoned interior, the superior floor plan focuses on large-scale gatherings with its warm & inviting blend of living spaces. Comprising 4 large bedrooms, master with walk-in robe & dual ensuite, fully equipped kitchen with an abundance of cupboard & bench space, adjoining a spacious open plan family meals area.
Step outside, fire up the BBQ on your decked alfresco & be amazed by the generous proportions that the private paradise provides which effortlessly meets up with the home to provide the ultimate indoor/outdoor integration. Truly the perfect haven for the all seasons entertainer & for kids to run around in complete privacy.
Extras include high ceilings, double remote garage, security system, ducted heating, 2 powerful split-system cooling units, roomy laundry & much much more! Homes like this do not come up often, so call now & be the proud new owner of this sensational offering.
Insights: 21 Perth Street, Craigieburn VIC 3064 was last sold in 2019 and 351 other 4 bedroom house in Craigieburn have recently been sold.

Description:
Period-Inspired Perfection on Approx 841sqm of Land!
Surrounded by established gardens on one of the area's largest allotments (approx 841sqm),
this magnificent 4 bedroom family home sets itself apart with its flexible floorplan, quality features throughout & wonderfully convenient location.
Beyond the distinctive Federation-inspired facade, discover a free-flowing interior comprising a large master bedroom with walk-in robe & spa ensuite, 3 additional bedrooms (all with robes, 2 with study desks), main family bathroom & separate WC. Multiple living zones include spacious formal lounge & dining, separate rumpus/family room & light-filled open living/meals area accompanied by a timber-cabinet kitchen complete with
stainless steel oven & dishwasher.
Other highlights of the home include a large laundry, ducted heating & evaporative cooling,
vaulted ceilings (lounge & living areas), new carpets & solid timber parquetry floors.
Double doors from the living area reveal a paved entertaining area with pergola & enormous
backyard with established gardens, plus the added advantage of a remote-control double
garage.
Walking distance to Hothlyn Drive buses, primary & secondary schools, local parks & Aitken
Creek trails, it's close to childcare centres and kindergartens, Craigieburn Station as well as easy freeway access. A truly outstanding family lifestyle opportunity!
Insights: 5 Newhaven Road, Craigieburn VIC 3064 was last sold in 2019 and 351 other 4 bedroom house in Craigieburn have recently been sold.

Description:
Family Perfection with Modern Comfort & Convenience
In a wonderfully quiet cul-de-sac this newly renovated stunner delivers a sensational family lifestyle with its expansive floorplan, terrific living/entertaining spaces & exceptionally large allotment (approx 661sqm).
With its free-flowing floorplan consisting of three bedrooms, master with walk-in robe & sparkling ensuite, equally stylish main bathroom, large formal lounge/dining area graced by a beautiful wood-fire, perfect for those cold nights indoors. Continue through to the heart of the home & experience an extensively updated modern kitchen with ample cupboard & stone-bench spaces, open plan meals flowing seamlessly through to a huge family room.
Step outside to experience the great outdoors that this home presents with a large rear garden, which effortlessly blends nature & privacy all in one amazing package & is ideal for hosting the largest of parties or even perfect for kids to play until their heart's content.
Complete with ducted heating, multiple split system cooling units, automatic internal blinds, roomy laundry, double remote garage with drive-thru access & so much more!
Positioned to please, smack bang in the heart of Craigieburn within easy access to Hothlyn Reserve, Primary & Secondary schools, local shops & public transport. If space, land & location are high on your agenda, then this home is sure to tick every single box on your must-have wish-list.
This property is amazing for all home buyers & investors alike with its brilliant blend of comfort & convenience, just move in and enjoy! Call now & be the proud new owner of this fantastic home.

Description:
SOLD BY SHAUN CHAUDHRY - 0421 429 408
If you looking to buy your first home or invest then this is the way to go. This Soon to be completed home will surely impress the most astute of buyers from owner occupiers to investors alike.
Comprising; 4 spacious bedrooms; master bedroom with full ensuite and walk-in robe, open plan kitchen with stone benchtop, quality s/s appliances, meals and family area and a separate lounge/theatre. Step outside in the alfresco, perfect for year round entertainment with enough space for your kids and pets to run around.
Conveniently located within walking distance to public transport, child care facilities, Champion Parade park, Soccer fields, Craigieburn South Secondary School will open its doors in Term 1 2020, Aitken Hill Primary School which is now open and just a short walk from Aston. Aston is located in Craigieburn, just 32 kilometres north of the Melbourne CBD and is only 16 kilometres from Melbourne Airport. Easy commute to Melbourne's CBD via the Hume Highway and Tullamarine Freeway These are just more features that will make your future brighter at Aston. Inspect this beautifully appointed home with confidence and be quick, for homes like these certainly don't last!
Call Shaun Chaudhry on 0421 429 408 to book your inspection!!
Please see the below link for an up-to-date copy of the Due Diligence Check List: http://www.consumer.vic.gov.au/duediligencechecklist

Description:
Entertaining in an ideal location
Situated in a beautiful tree lined street, this immediately appealing family home will surprise by its spaciousness and fabulous entertaining zones. Perfect for first home buyers, young families, downsizers and savvy investors alike, this attractive and well-presented home will delight
Bedroom accommodation consists of a spacious master with walk in robe which caters for clothing and storage requirements, whilst the ensuite is spacious yet practical. The second bedroom provides the ultimate cinema experience with a fully equipped projector and monitor, which allows for movie time events from the comfort of your own bed.
Perfectly presented, the expansive light filled living/dining space is a highlight of the home and features a neat kitchen with stainless steel appliances which flows onto intimate meals area and comfortable lounge.
The heart and soul of this home is the grand scale entertaining zones, the garage has been transformed into the ideal recreational room. The roller door has been insulated and carpet laid to keep comfort at a premium whilst engaging with guests.
Adding further appeal to this already charming home is an undercover alfresco dining area with manual all-weather blinds to ensure the very best in entertaining all year round. A simple yet stylish garden provides privacy from neighbours and adds scenic appeal to the outdoors.
Positioned within minutes to the Hume Hwy/bypass, Mother Teresa's Catholic Primary School, Craigieburn Plaza, Highland Shopping Centre, Craigieburn Primary School, Hume Anglican Grammar.
Other features include video intercom, garden shed, ducted heating, evaporative cooling, shelving in garage, projector, monitor and much more.
*We have obtained all information in this document from sources we believe to be reliable; however, we cannot guarantee its accuracy. Prospective buyers are advised to carry out their own investigations.*
Insights: 6 Marchmont Rise, Craigieburn VIC 3064 was last sold in 2019 and 245 other 3 bedroom house in Craigieburn have recently been sold.

Description:
BRAND NEW HOME READY TO MOVE!!!
If you are looking to buy your first home or invest the this is the way to go.
This home will surely impress the most astute of buyers from owner occupiers to investors alike.
Comprising; 4 spacious bedrooms; master bedroom with full Ensuite and walk-in robe, Open plan kitchen with stone bench top and quality stainless steel appliances unites the sleeping zones to meals and family, allowing the family to catch up on the day's events together. Other three bedrooms with built in robes are serviced by a central bathroom. A separate lounge/theatre and enormous alfresco is perfect for year round entertainment for your kids, friends and family.
Conveniently located within walking distance to public transport, childcare facilities,Champion Parade park, Soccer fields, Craigieburn South Secondary School will open its doors in Term 1 2020, Aitken Hill Primary School which is now kilometres north of the Melbourne CBD and is only 16 kilometres from Melbourne Airport. Easy commute to Melbourne CBD. These are just more features that will make your future brighter at Aston.
Call Gordon Garg on 0433 897 397 today to book your inspection!
Please see the below link for an up-to-date copy of the Due Diligence Check List: http://www.consumer.vic.gov.au/duediligencechecklist

Description:
Picture Perfect, Warm & Welcoming
Presented with love & pride, this impeccable home is one that will ignite your excitement. Fabulous décor & functional floor plan complements an attractive facade & manicured low-maintenance gardens. Designed for easy living this low maintenance residence boasts comfort & style that will delight the most fastidious home buyer or investor.
It's smartly configured floorplan comprises of a fully equipped kitchen with 900ml stainless steel appliances that adjoins to a spacious open plan meals & separate family room which effortlessly links outside to provide the ultimate indoor/outdoor integration with an outdoor living zone. Sleeping quarters includes 3 bedrooms including master with walk-in robe & ensuite with double vanity and sparkling central bathroom.
Step outside & enjoy the homes perfect covered outdoor setting which provides peace & privacy whilst you entertain all seasons. Further features include a larger than normal single garage, fully equipped laundry, ducted heating, split-system cooling, quality cafe blinds & so much more!
Located in a quiet and well-presented street, close to public transport, schools, parklands, Highlands shopping centre & Craigieburn Central.

Description:
Light & Style with Impressive Family Versatility
Immaculately presented & ready to simply move in & enjoy, this contemporary 4 bedroom home
delivers a feature-packed entry into Highlands with its intelligent design, quality inclusions & abundance of natural light throughout.
Impressive interior comprises a master bedroom with walk-in robe & private ensuite, 3 additional bedrooms (all with built-in robes), stylish main bathroom & separate WC.
Add to this a central lounge leading through to the open-plan living/dining area & well-
appointed kitchen complete with tiled splashbacks, stainless steel cooking appliances &
dishwasher.
Other highlights of the home include ducted heating & split-system air-condtioning, solar/gas hot water service, family-sized laundry, plus al-fresco area, north-facing backyard & remote-control double garage with internal entry.
Positioned for convenience walking distance to Malcolm Creek trails & parkland, close to
Highlands Shopping Centre, public transport & the area's popular schools including Mount
Ridley College & Hume Anglican Grammar.

Description:
Relax, Entertain & Enjoy. (703sqm land approximately)
From the moment you step inside you will be impressed with the quality & style that this family home has to offer. With a vibrant, charismatic personality, this cleverly designed home delivers easy, practical & flexible living for all. Comprising of ducted heating, coonara & split system cooling, large open plan kitchen with stainless steel appliances & dishwasher overlooking the meals area with adjoining family room. There is a rumpus room PLUS formal lounge, huge master bedroom with walk in robe & ensuite, window shutters, alarm system, built in robes to remaining bedrooms, double lock up garage with internal access and more. Step outside and you will find an entertainers delight, complete with large under cover alfresco area and surrounded by stunning landscaped gardens. All situated on 703sqm land approximately and with side gate access while ideally located in one of Craigieburn's most popular estates & tightly held streets amongst quality homes & adjacent to parkland. With all the amenities close by including shopping centers, public transport & schools. You better be quick as this one won't hang around for long, inspection will not disappoint!!

Located in the thriving Aston Estate, this block comes with close proximity to transport, schools and Craigieburn Central Shopping Centre.
With everything Craigieburn has to offer already, future planning is in place for more amenities such as schools, shops and facilities.
Surrounded by beautiful parklands and an amazing family friendly community this is definitely a place you would feel proud to call home.

Description:
DREAM COME TRUE...
Harcouts real estate in Roxburgh Park, proudly present's " 6 Northfield Drive, Craigieburn". Located in Mt Ridley Estate with amazing city views. Elegant, luxurious, beautiful, spacious, these are just some of the words that come to mind when inspecting this magnificent 5 bedroom family home.
This breathtaking home offers luxury living space as well as a striking fireplace in the lounge area perfect for those who demand the very best in life, Be swept away by the innovative design of this immaculate home, offering an open floor plan and all the creature comforts one would desire.
Superbly elegant open-plan living and dining areas! Kitchen area boasting the best in Bosch Appliances including 900mm Stainless Steel cooktop & double wall oven, coffee machine, dishwasher gas cook top, sprawling stone benches and an impressive walk-in pantry with an additional cooktop & oven.this stunning home greets you with a wide & bright entry boasting high 3m ceilings, leading to a beautiful guest bedroom complete with ensuite and walk-in robe. Enjoy relaxing with family and friends at the stylish alfresco area featuring a kitchenette an barbeque, perfect for entertaining all year long.
Relax in the spacious through the striking timber & glass balustrade staircase, which takes you to the lovely upstairs retreat area that opens onto a balcony to enjoy the remarkable views. Here, you will also find 4 more bedrooms (2 with ensuites & walk-in robes), as well as a gleaming central bathroom.
Other highlights include, ducted heating & refrigerated cooling, ducted vacuum, alarm system, high ceilings, timber floors, large laundry & excellent storage spaces throughout, plus undercover alfresco area & expansive backyard with lush lawns.
Youll definitely love the perfect location Close to Malcolm Creek trails & parklands, Highlands Shopping Centre & public transport, as
well as popular schools including Mount Ridley College & Hume Anglican Grammar.
Be quick to book your inspection & secure this magnificent beauty.
Call Nada Hanna 0404 804 542 to book your inspection today. Photo ID required for all Inspections.
DISCLAIMER: All stated dimensions are approximate only. Particulars given are for general information only and do not constitute any representation on the part of the vendor or agent.
Please see the below link for an up-to-date copy of the Due Diligence Check List: http://www.consumer.vic.gov.au/duediligence

Description:
Calling All Fist Homes Buyers And Investors!
Located in the always popular Mt Ridley estate amongst quality homes and beautiful streetscape this home will surely impress. Offering 3 bedrooms, fully equipped kitchen with stainless steel appliances and dishwasher, main bathroom, master bedroom with walk in robe and ensuite, large open plan meals area with adjoining family room and more. Step outside and you will find an entertainer's delight with great size alfresco coupled with low maintenance landscaped gardens. A host of extras also include high ceilings, ducted heating & evaporative cooling, lock up garage with remote control and internal access and much more. Situated close by to schools, public transport, parklands and shopping centres this home will appeal to all. An Inspection Will Not Disappoint

Description:
Picture Perfect, Warm & Welcoming
From the moment you step inside you will be impressed with the quality & style that this family home has to offer. With a vibrant, charismatic personality & cleverly designed home which delivers easy, practical & flexible living for all.
Beyond its striking facade, the home's beautifully appointed interior boasts a large master bedroom fitted with walk in robe & deluxe ensuite, three additional good size bedrooms, stunning main bathroom and the perfect formal lounge.
Other luxuries include kitchen with stainless steel appliances, Caesar stone benches, dishwasher & walk in pantry overlooking the dining/living room, heating & cooling, alarm system, downlight throughout, high ceilings, double car garage with internal access, immaculately landscaped front and rear gardens and the picture perfect undercover alfresco perfect for all family occasions.
An aspirational family lifestyle located in one of Craigieburn's most popular estates & premium streets amongst quality homes & parkland. With all amenities close by including Craigieburn Central, Stockland shopping centre, public transport and local schools. This home really is the complete package, be quick to inspect as it won't hang around for long!
